#include <irrlicht.h>

Classes

class  CIrrCC
 The central class of IrrConfigController This class is used to provide the use configurable Irrlicht controller. Controller items can be defined, and the user will be able to change the controls using a GUI provided by this class. Controls can be grouped into several sets, but this does only influence the creation of the GUI. More...
class  CIrrCC::CIrrCC::CIrrCCItem
 this class represents the controllers the user can configure
class  CIrrCC::CIrrCC::CJoyState
 This class is used for detecting joystick movement when changing an item's control.
